# Buoyant (Spell)
## Overview
Transmutation

Level: Alchemist 1

BoXM: Wizard 1

Casting Time: 1 standard action

Components: S

Range: Personal

Target: You

Duration: 1 round/level

Saving Throw: None

Spell Resistance: No

Source: Deep Magic (Kobold Press), pg. 137

No matter how hard you try, you cannot be submerged in any kind of liquid. With a successful Acrobatics check of DC 10 (calm water), DC 15 (slowly moving water) or DC 20 (fast or rough water) you can walk on water as if moving through difficult terrain.
